title: Jude the Obscure - reference to "echoes" serves to

content.question: The reference to “echoes” (first sentence) serves to

choices.label: introduce a series of descriptions of the lives of workers who preceded Jude
comment on Jude’s curiosity about the historical meaning of a place
present a sequence of pastoral images that reflect Jude’s inner world
establish an aura of mystery that is sustained through the narrative

content.answer: introduce a series of descriptions of the lives of workers who preceded Jude

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify and describe specific textual details that convey or reveal a setting.
